snippet.title: [Trailer] Artillery: Knights vs. Orcs
snippet.description:
Coming this thursday to European DSiWare for 500 Points/£4.50/€5.00.

The battlefield is calling!

In Artillery: Knights vs. Orcs, the knights and orcs fight from a distance with powerful cannons. Choose a team and, utilising your full arsenal, bombard your opponent. Adjust the fire power and angle of your cannon, and don't forget to keep an eye on the wind direction and strength.

- Exciting artillery action in a fantasy comic style.
- Two single-player campaigns.
- 200 levels.
- Multiplayer mode with three difficulty levels.
